title: Dear Riot Please let me delete some champs !
body: They're are certain champs i bought by mistake or i accidentally re-rolled into a permanent champ into my collection . This bothers me because i don't like every champ . Im not asking for a refund , i just want them OUT of my personal collection please . This would benefit the company as well , as you would make a good profit off indecisive people who may want to delete a champ and buy them again , thus they would pay a second time for the champ and any skins they may have had of it .  Please please HEAR MY CRIES lol and implement some sort of delete a champ system . Im a good League player who spends a lot and loves the community . I will literally PAY you guys if i have too . their are just certain champs i'm not good with and want out of my collection and have no interest in wanting to keep .

replies.body: While we may not be able to offer a refund without tokens, we can look into removing champs for you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you directly on this.
please don't help poeple to create aram account, it's already pretty bad as it is now (maybe it's not the case here, but allowing one person to do so open the gate for abuse :s)
yeah its definitely not the case for me . I have nearly half of all league champs . i just wanna remove like five of them because they're eye sores since i'm bad with those 5 .

well, think of it that way.

Is it worth making a jurisprudence with that "removal via support stuff" just to no see them in your collection.

Maybe it's not your case, but it open a path to create perfect account for random pick mode and support will have to do it because "they did it once"

Nah, they should stuck to the 3 refund system to removing stuff from your account and that's all
Please just stop pooping on my dreams ...
